name: Wei Wang 0054
content: Wei Wang's Research Site Wei Wang's Research Site Home Publications Research Projects Teaching CV Wei Wang Associate Professor Computer Science The University of Texas at San Antonio wei dot wang at utsa dot edu I am an Assistant Professor at the Department of Computer Science at UTSA. I got my PhD from University of Virginia in 2015. My research falls in the intersection of the areas of system software, cloud computing, computer architecture and software engineering. More specifically, my research is about optimizing the performance and energy efficiency of large-scale computing systems with new system software, hardware and software developing techniques.
